title: Happy Co.

fields.name: Monopoly Bonus:
fields.value: Gain 2 **Happy**, 💵, and 🛡️ every turn you take.

desc:
Post 1964
- Set Color: Alexandrite
_ _
- When you play this, gain 1 **Happy** 😃.
- While this is in your personal status, whenever you play a card, you may spend 1 😃 to draw a <:monopoly:1171651746762866799> card in the Alexandrite set.
 - For each house bought, gain 1 **Happy** 😃.
 - When a hotel is bought, gain 2 **Happy** 😃.
 - For each skyscraper bought, gain an extra **Happy** 😃 every time you gain a **Happy**.
